item.title: MORGAN GROUP HOLDING CO 10-K
item.description: MORGAN GROUP HOLDING CO, which is in the Security & Commodity Brokers, Dealers, Exchanges & Services [6200] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 01, 2022 had 9931 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 216 instances financial - 111 instances 31 - 94 instances research - 89 instances tax - 88 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
